name: uk-care-regulatory-intelligence
description: Track UK care sector regulatory changes and compliance requirements
long_description: Automated intelligence gathering on UK care sector regulatory changes, including Gov.uk publications, Parliamentary activity, and compliance deadlines. Monitors DHSC and CQC guidance to keep product roadmaps aligned with regulatory requirements.

tools.name: search_publications
tools.description: Search Gov.uk for regulatory publications, guidance, and policy documents from DHSC and CQC

tools.name: get_parliamentary_questions
tools.description: Track written parliamentary questions and answers about the care sector from DHSC

tools.name: get_regulatory_calendar
tools.description: Find upcoming regulatory changes, consultations, and compliance deadlines

tools.name: generate_monthly_digest
tools.description: Generate comprehensive monthly intelligence report covering all sources
